p: Each experiment was performed independently at least three times and the data are presented as mean ± SEM for the indicated number of separate experiments. Student’s t-test was used to compare the mean of each group with that of the control group in experiments and one-way ANOVA was used in animal study. p Values <0.05 were considered significant (* p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001).
